0011011001000111 1110110011100110 1 -> sum: 0010001100101110, cout: 1

1101011100101111 1010001011111001 1 -> sum: 0111101000101001, cout: 1
1110011110101000 0011001111000110 0 -> sum: 0001101101101110, cout: 1
0000101011110010 1011001110100110 0 -> sum: 1011111010011000, cout: 0
0111011010101110 1000010110011100 0 -> sum: 1111110001001010, cout: 0
